entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
